TopicTitle: Transparent mode for cargo bay & structural fuselage

Articles.Content:
Now when we doing stuff inside cargo bay, we need to keep moving the camera or open the cargo bay to see what's going on inside

I suggest a transparent mode for those hollow parts. When toggle on, those part become half transparent and can't react with mouse click (action group still OK), then we will have a x'ray eyes to see through inside

User can click the part inside those hollow part when the camera outside those hollow part.

Transparent mode also make MK3 hollow fuselage become a feasible option, for those cargo plane that never exit the atmosphere, (maybe)cheaper cost and part attachable on every side
This is a great Idea, I could get behind this. Those cargo bays are always bothersome to deal with.
